field.name: grpfChp
field.description: Collection of the 32 flags

bit.name: fRMarkDel
bit.description: has been deleted and will be displayed with strikethrough when revision marked text is to be displayed

bit.name: fVanish
bit.description: text has hidden format, and is not displayed unless fPagHidden is set in the DOP

bit.name: fRMark
bit.description: text is newly typed since the last time revision marks have been accepted and will be displayed with an underline when revision marked text is to be displayed

bit.name: fSpec
bit.description: Character is a Word special character

bit.name: fShadow
bit.description: Character is drawn with a shadow

bit.name: fLowerCase
bit.description: Character is displayed in lower case. This field may be set to 1 only when chp.fSmallCaps is 1.

bit.name: fData
bit.description: chp.fcPic points to an FFDATA, the data structure binary data used by Word to describe a form field. The bit chp.fData may only be 1 when chp.fSpec is also 1 and the special character in the document stream that has this property is a chPicture (0x01)

bit.name: fOle2
bit.description: chp.lTagObj specifies a particular object in the object stream that specifies the particular OLE object in the stream that should be displayed when the chPicture fSpec character that is tagged with the fOle2 is encountered. The bit chp.fOle2 may only be 1 when chp.fSpec is also 1 and the special character in the document stream that has this property is a chPicture (0x01).

bit.name: fComplexScripts
bit.description: Complex Scripts text that requires special processing to display and process

bit.name: fBiDi
bit.description: Complex Scripts right-to-left text that requires special processing to display and process (character reordering; contextual shaping; display of combining characters and diacritics; specialized justification rules; cursor positioning)

field.name: hps
field.description: Font size in half points

field.name: ftcAscii
field.description: Font for ASCII text

field.name: ftcFE
field.description: Font for East Asian text

field.name: ftcOther
field.description: Font for non-East Asian text

field.name: ftcBi
field.description: Font for Complex Scripts text

field.name: dxaSpace
field.description: Space following each character in the run expressed in twip units.

field.name: cv
field.description: 24-bit color

field.name: ico
field.description: Color of text for Word 97

field.name: pctCharWidth
field.description: Character scale

field.name: kcd
field.description: Emphasis mark

field.name: fUndetermine
field.description: Character is undetermined

field.name: iss
field.description: Superscript/subscript indices

field.name: fSpecSymbol
field.description: Used by Word internally

field.name: idct
field.description: Not stored in file

field.name: idctHint
field.description: Identifier of Character type

field.name: kul
field.description: Underline code

field.name: hpsKern
field.description: Kerning distance for characters in run recorded in half points

field.name: hpsPos
field.description: Reserved (actually used as vertical offset(?) value)

field.name: ibstRMark
field.description: Index to author IDs stored in hsttbfRMark. Used when text in run was newly typed when revision marking was enabled

field.name: sfxtText
field.description: Text animation

field.name: fDblBdr
field.description: Used internally by Word

field.name: fBorderWS
field.description: Used internally by Word

field.name: ufel
field.description: Collection properties represented by itypFELayout and copt (East Asian layout properties)

bit.name: fTNY
bit.description: Tatenakayoko: Horizontal-in-vertical (range of text in a direction perpendicular to the text flow) is used

bit.name: fWarichu
bit.description: Two lines in one (text in the group is displayed as two half-height lines within a line)

field.name: copt
field.description: Collection of the 5 flags

field.name: hpsAsci
field.description: Font size for ASCII font

field.name: hpsFE
field.description: Font size for East Asian text

field.name: hpsBi
field.description: Font size for Complex Scripts text

field.name: ftcSym
field.description: an index into the rgffn structure. When chp.fSpec is 1 and the character recorded for the run in the document stream is chSymbol (0x28), chp.ftcSym identifies the font code of the symbol font that will be used to display the symbol character recorded in chp.xchSym.

field.name: xchSym
field.description: When chp.fSpec==1 and the character recorded for the run in the document stream is chSymbol (0x28), the character stored chp.xchSym will be displayed using the font specified in chp.ftcSym.

field.name: fcPic
field.description: Offset in data stream pointing to beginning of a picture when character is a picture character (character is 0x01 and chp.fSpec is 1).

field.name: fcObj
field.description: Offset in data stream pointing to beginning of a picture when character is an OLE1 object character (character is 0x20 and chp.fSpec is 1, chp.fOle2 is 0).

field.name: lTagObj
field.description: An object ID for an OLE object, only set if chp.fSpec and chp.fOle2 are both true, and chp.fObj.

field.name: fcData
field.description: Points to location of picture data, only if chp.fSpec is true.

field.name: ibstRMarkDel
field.description: Index to author IDs stored in hsttbfRMark. Used when text in run was deleted when revision marking was enabled.

field.name: dttmRMark
field.description: Date/time at which this run of text was entered/modified by the author (Only recorded when revision marking is on.)

field.name: dttmRMarkDel
field.description: Date/time at which this run of text was deleted by the author (Only recorded when revision marking is on.)

field.name: istd
field.description: Index to character style descriptor in the stylesheet that tags this run of text. When istd is istdNormalChar (10 decimal), characters in run are not affected by a character style. If chp.istd contains any other value, chpx of the specified character style are applied to CHP for this run before any other exceptional properties are applied.

field.name: idslRMReason
field.description: An index to strings displayed as reasons for actions taken by Word's AutoFormat code

field.name: idslReasonDel
field.description: An index to strings displayed as reasons for actions taken by Word's AutoFormat code

field.name: cpg
field.description: Code page of run in pre-Unicode files

bit.name: fHighlight
bit.description: When 1, characters are highlighted with color specified by chp.icoHighlight

bit.name: fChsDiff
bit.description: Pre-Unicode files, char's char set different from FIB char set

bit.name: fMacChs
bit.description: fTrue if char's are Macintosh char set

field.name: fPropRMark
field.description: properties have been changed with revision marking on

field.name: ibstPropRMark
field.description: Index to author IDs stored in hsttbfRMark. Used when properties have been changed when revision marking was enabled.

field.name: dttmPropRMark
field.description: Date/time at which properties of this were changed for this run of text by the author. (Only recorded when revision marking is on.)

field.name: fConflictOrig
field.description: When chp.wConflict!=0, this is TRUE when text is part of the original version of text. When FALSE, text is alternative introduced by reconciliation operation.

field.name: fConflictOtherDel
field.description: When fConflictOtherDel==fTrue, the other side of a reconciliation conflict causes this text to be deleted

field.name: wConflict
field.description: When != 0, index number that identifies all text participating in a particular conflict incident

field.name: IbstConflict
field.description: Who made this change for this side of the conflict.

field.name: dttmConflict
field.description: When the change was made

field.name: fDispFldRMark
field.description: the number for a ListNum field is being tracked in xstDispFldRMark. If that number is different from the current value, the number has changed. Only valid for ListNum fields.

field.name: ibstDispFldRMark
field.description: Index to author IDs stored in hsttbfRMark. Used when ListNum field numbering has been changed when revision marking was enabled.

field.name: dttmDispFldRMark
field.description: The date for the ListNum field number change

field.name: xstDispFldRMark
field.description: The string value of the ListNum field when revision mark tracking began

field.name: fcObjp
field.description: Offset in the data stream indicating the location of OLE object data

field.name: lbrCRJ
field.description: Line BReak code for xchCRJ

field.name: fSpecVanish
field.description: Special hidden for leading emphasis (always hidden)

field.name: fHasOldProps
field.description: Used for character property revision marking. The chp at the time fHasOldProps is set to 1, the is the old chp.

field.name: fSdtVanish
field.description: Mark the character as hidden.
